verses.text: And the \sc Lord\sc* spake unto Moses, saying,

Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, \add and\add* my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, \add for\add* a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

And thou shalt say unto them, This \add is\add* the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the \sc Lord\sc*; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, \add for\add* a continual burnt offering.
The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;
and a tenth \add part\add* of an ephah \add of\add* flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth \add part\add* of a hin of beaten oil.
\add It is\add* a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the \sc Lord\sc*.

And the drink offering thereof \add shall be\add* the fourth \add part\add* of a hin for the one lamb: in the holy \add place\add* shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the \sc Lord\sc* \add for\add* a drink offering.

And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer \add it\add*, a sacrifice made by fire, \add of\add* a sweet savour unto the \sc Lord\sc*.
And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals \add of\add* flour \add for\add* a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:
\add this is\add* the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the \sc Lord\sc*; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

and three tenth deals \add of\add* flour \add for\add* a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals \add of\add* flour \add for\add* a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

and a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil \add for\add* a meat offering unto one lamb; \add for\add* a burnt offering \add of\add* a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the \sc Lord\sc*.

And their drink offerings shall be half a hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third \add part\add* of a hin unto a ram, and a fourth \add part\add* of a hin unto a lamb: this \add is\add* the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the \sc Lord\sc* shall be offered, besides the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
And in the fourteenth day of the first month \add is\add* the passover of the \sc Lord\sc*.
And in the fifteenth day of this month \add is\add* the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
In the first day \add shall be\add* a holy convocation; ye shall do no \add manner of\add* servile work \add therein:\add*

but ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire \add for\add* a burnt offering unto the \sc Lord\sc*; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:
and their meat offering \add shall be of\add* flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;
a several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
and one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.
Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which \add is\add* for a continual burnt offering.

After this manner ye shall offer daily, \add throughout\add* the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, \add of\add* a sweet savour unto the \sc Lord\sc*: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
And on the seventh day ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the \sc Lord\sc*, after your weeks \add be out\add*, ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
but ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the \sc Lord\sc*; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
and their meat offering \add of\add* flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,
a several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
\add and\add* one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
Ye shall offer \add them\add* besides the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
